mapper.select: SELECT wnr.* FROM tb_warn_notify_relation wnr LEFT JOIN tb_data_warn_log dwl1 ON wnr.Type = 1 AND wnr.WarnLogID = dwl1.ID LEFT JOIN tb_device_warn_log dwl2 ON wnr.Type = 2 AND wnr.WarnLogID = dwl2.ID WHERE (wnr.Type=1 AND dwl1.WarnEndTime IS NOT NULL AND dwl1.CompanyID=#{param.companyID} AND dwl1.Platform=#{param.platform}) OR (wnr.Type=2 AND dwl2.WarnEndTime IS NOT NULL AND dwl2.CompanyID=#{param.companyID} AND dwl2.Platform=#{param.platform}) ORDER BY wnr.ID DESC LIMIT 1
